text: Searching for Zero is the fifth studio album by the Canadian hardcore punk band Cancer Bats. It was released on 10 March 2015 and was recorded in Ross Robinson's studio in Venice Beach, California. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== ;Cancer Bats * Liam Cormier – lead vocals * Scott Middleton – guitar * Mike Peters – drums, percussion * Jaye R. Schwarzer – bass guitar ;Additional personnel * Ross Robinson – production ==References== Category:2015 albums Category:Cancer Bats albums
title: Searching for Zero
